messages.title: Tourism – essential for the economy!
messages.content: Elfyn Llwyd has worked diligently for the constituency of Dwyfor Meirionnydd – ensuring that tourism is promoted as well as improving infrastructure like rail and road access.

messages.title: Supporting Local Representatives!
messages.content: Elfyn Llwyd always stands up for local representation, ensuring that local voices and decisions are heard at the national level.

messages.title: Succeeding for the next generation!
messages.content: Arguably the most successful Assembly Member for the wider area – securing millions in compensation for the BSE crisis and fighting for the people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to improving the economy by promoting tourism as a key asset for the constituency and by ensuring good rail and road connectivity.
Advocates for ensuring that local voices are represented at all levels and that local decisions are upheld to defend the community's best interest.
"Plaid Cymru yn cefnogi ffermwyr ifanc" (Plaid Cymru supports young farmers) - policies aimed at supporting young farmers, as well as educational and career opportunities for the youth.

issues.economy: The MP has worked diligently to ensure that tourism, a key aspect of the local economy, is promoted.
issues.governance: Stands up for local decisions to be heard and made at a national level.

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured significant compensation for the BSE crisis, stands up for constituents at the national level.

quotes.text: "Hwn yw ein cyfle i ethol Aelod Seneddol sy'n gwybod sut i ymladd dros ei bobl." (This is our chance to elect a Member of Parliament who knows how to fight for his people.)

images.caption: Elfyn Llwyd engaging with constituents and participating in local events.
